tool_description: Analyzes sentiment trends over time to identify patterns, changes, and seasonal variations in customer satisfaction.

sentiment_data.description: Array of sentiment scores with timestamps

time_period.description: Time aggregation period (daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly)

trend_window.description: Moving average window size for trend calculation

seasonal_analysis.description: Whether to perform seasonal pattern analysis

error_messages: Insufficient data: Provide at least 5 data points for trend analysis.
Invalid trend window: Window size must be between 3 and 30.
Malformed sentiment data: Each data point must include timestamp and sentiment score.
Date range too short: Provide data spanning at least the specified time period.
usage: Input timestamped sentiment data and specify aggregation period. Configure trend analysis parameters. Returns trend analysis with patterns and anomalies.

anomalies_detected.description: List of detected sentiment anomalies with dates

trend_summary.description: Summary of key trend insights and patterns
